definition: to hit/to strike/to attack/to crack down on sth/blow/(psychological) shock/percussion (music)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures

pinyin: da3 ji1 she4 hui4 cai2 fu4
da3 ji1 jun1 shi4 li4 liang5

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯说，伊朗和北韩没有掌握可以打击欧洲的导弹。

sentences.english: She recovered consciousness soon after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 她很快从打击中恢复过来。

sentences.english: Our thinking is of the Fred Flintstone vintage, hence the Chinese blow us away.
sentences.chinese: 我们的思维是弗雷德是延续，因此中国任意打击我们。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用电子邮件不行吗，谈论一下对我自大的打击。

sentences.english: It was the cruellest blow to Gandhi.
sentences.chinese: 这是对甘地最残酷的打击。

sentences.english: I would guess that, in that situation where a percussion player misses a crash.
sentences.chinese: 我想如果一名打击乐演奏者错过了该敲的点。

sentences.english: Wewere attacked relentlessly by winds that tried to topple it over.
sentences.chinese: 大风也无情地打击着我们，想尽办法想要把船弄翻。

sentences.english: Stage-16 Stator Vane was damaged by foreign objects on several places.
sentences.chinese: 压气机第16级有多处静叶受异物打击受损。

sentences.english: And the percussion instruments are used in the "running boat" and "pushing boat".
sentences.chinese: 打击乐一般在跑船或赶船者推船时使用。

sentences.english: An outdoor game in which the players drive wooden balls through a series of wickets using long-handled mallets.
sentences.chinese: 一种游戏选手通过一系列环绕来打击一个木头球。

sentences.english: That' s after a US-Iraqi crackdown against his followers continues.
sentences.chinese: 那之后，美国和伊拉克打击他的追随者仍在继续。

sentences.english: Napoleon planned to strike a quick blow at his old enemy.
sentences.chinese: 拿破伦策划对他的宿敌实施迅雷不及掩耳的打击。

sentences.english: Similar shifts occurred in other crisis-hit countries.
sentences.chinese: 在其它受危机打击的国家也出现了类似的转移。

sentences.english: The shock was deadly to him.
sentences.chinese: 这次打击对他是致命的。

sentences.english: His death will be a terrible blow to his family.
sentences.chinese: 他的死将使他的家庭大受打击。

sentences.english: However see him one face determined, six Shis thousand also have no not bashful fight him.
sentences.chinese: 不过看他一脸坚决，陆莳千也没好意思打击他。

definition: to thwart/to foil (sb's plans)/a setback/a failure/a defeat
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to check/to contain/to hold back/to keep within limits/to constrain/to restrain
to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
